function.name: fileinfo
function.description: Returns a list with information regarding the file uri on the local computer. Returns a list with exists=false if the file or directory doesn’t exist.

example.description: The following logs info regarding file C:\Temp\a.xlsx:

examples.example: { canExecute = true, canRead = true, canWrite = true, exists = true, extension = "xlsx", filename = "a.xlsx", isDirectory = false, isHidden = false, isRegularFile = true, isSymbolicLink = false, lastAccessTime = 2014-02-12T16:11:08.536, lastModifiedTime = 2014-02-12T16:11:08.542, length = 11668, path = "c:\temp\a.xlsx" }

example.description: The following logs info regarding directory C:\Temp:

examples.example: { canExecute = true, canRead = true, canWrite = true, exists = true, isDirectory = true, isHidden = false, isRegularFile = false, isSymbolicLink = false, lastAccessTime = 2014-02-12T16:37:29.43, lastModifiedTime = 2014-02-12T16:37:29.43, length = 16384, path = "c:\temp" }
